message.content:
cs.SD, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.LG

The paper proposes an automated approach to identifying the most salient melody line in a symbolic score, which is a task related to Music Information Retrieval. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.SD (Sound), which deals with audio and music processing. The paper also uses a convolutional neural network (CNN) to estimate the probability that each note in the score belongs to the melody line, which is a common technique in computer vision and image processing. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) are also likely categories. Finally, the paper proposes a method to analyze the influence exerted by notes on the prediction of other notes, which is related to interpretability and explainability of neural networks, a topic that falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning).
